watson_discovery_advisor.quote_copy: Watson Discovery Advisor is a powerful tool that not only understands nuances in human language, but also has the ability to understand the language across industries... [The] Watson Discovery Advisor can reduce the time researchers need... bringing new levels of speed and precision to research and development, from months to days and days to just hours.

watson_engagement_advisor.quote_copy: The new way to work is about making things personal. The Watson Engagement Advisor learns from user data to create individual experiences. This tool allows users to interact with Watson -- in natural language -- to find relevant solutions to their challenges. The ability to understand unstructured data in such an engaging way is changing the way to customers are serviced.
